website_summaries.verdict: The Google Chromebook Pixel (64GB, LTE) is a luxury laptop that needs Internet access to work at its best. If you already use a pricey mutli-GB Verizon 4G LTE data plan and have ready access to power, the Chromebook Pixel makes sense. However, it has some first generation hiccups to iron out before many more convert to Chrome OS all the time.
pros: Comes with 1TB Google Drive subscription for three years
cons: Some reverberations from keyboard and chassis at high volume levels
Aside from the light bar and piano hinge, it's blocky like like a reference model from the mid 2000s
Internet access is not ubiquitous and cheap (yet)

customer_reviews.title: Excellent screen. Con
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Excellent screen. Con: Fan spins loudly even when NOTHING is running. I log in to Chromebook. I don't open any application. Fan starts running. I open up crosh, I type in "top" -- everything is at < 5% cpu usage. Fan continues running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Guaranteed to NOT disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Unbelievable clarity on the display! The sound is clear and certainly loud enough to fill a room for comfortable listening. It's something you have to handle to believe just how cool it is! This is definitely a high-quality item to satisfy that hard-to-please person on your list! Not to forget, you get 1 TB cloud storage free for 3 years!
customer_reviews.author: John Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is a big transition to go from a desktop to a chromebook. As soon as I accepted the concept that is was the same operating system as my android it became the perfect machine to have in the living room. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: David D. Shealor

customer_reviews.title: Great product in original packing except of course for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product in original packing except of course for the battery life. I was initially worried that the battery would have died even before it was switched on for the first time as it's a 3.5 years old piece that I purchased recently but I realised that the battery was just fine. I also got the 1 TB storage free although I won't be needing that much anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Santosh Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright screen and louder speakers than other laptops and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this as an ubuntu linux machine via crouton. Nice bright screen and louder speakers than other laptops and chromebooks. Keys and trackpad have a nice feel to them. Can't install google play store when using ChromeOS but since I rarely use it for that, I can't complain
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Benmore

customer_reviews.title: Great buy to run Linux
customer_reviews.text: At first I was looking for a cheap Chromebook to put Linux on. Then I remembered how cheap the pixels have become. Google no longer updates the OS on the older pixels which I think is stupid because the hardware can support it and then some. But I repurposed this unit and installed kali Linux and now this unit is a super Linux laptop. Note to Google: Support your older hardware longer or you’ll become the Android of Laptops.
customer_reviews.author: Louis DeWeaver

customer_reviews.title: the screen is amazing, but of course short battery life
customer_reviews.text: A true Masterpiece...if you don't mind losing out on Android Apps, which I do not mind. Loads fast, the screen is amazing, but of course short battery life, When I am out, I do not use laptop for extended hours so it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Keniba

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great and the screen
customer_reviews.text: For the Price, cant go wrong! I'm using it for emails and browsing on the computer. Looks and feels great and the screen, WOW! I bought another for a rainy day
customer_reviews.author: tomAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Def an awesome buy for the price I
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge apple fan, and have primarily only programmed on a Mac. Although that has not changed, this thing is absolutely gorgeous, I installed a chroot linux install on it, and I use it to practice programming on the go and at work, and I can get over how well it is made and how well it performs. Def an awesome buy for the price I paid
customer_reviews.author: Marc M.

customer_reviews.title: the battery life is pathetic at 3-3
customer_reviews.text: The heat this thing generates is almost unbearable, the battery life is pathetic at 3-3.5 hours. The slick design and awesome screen (I mean, the display is unbelievable) are no substitutes for the scolding hot keyboard and inability to take it to class for the day without a charger...
customer_reviews.author: Anton S.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: No LTE outdated chromebook as no play store, look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: CEM

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome computer. Just look at the the specs
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome computer. Just look at the the specs. I use it to connect to my work computer through a secure gateway. Boots in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: C. Allen

customer_reviews.title: This was a bargain on a great machine. The Google Pixel was initially introduced at ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a bargain on a great machine. The Google Pixel was initially introduced at over $1,000, which was far to expensive for a chromebook. The product has since been discontinued, but you can still find some brand new units at less than $400.
customer_reviews.author: airjaudon

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife and she loves it. Very well made and fast. She especially likes the backlit keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hanna

customer_reviews.title: No more free 100MB from Verizon
customer_reviews.text: Like it a lot, and you can still buy 4G connectivity, but no more free 100MB from Verizon.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nonymous

customer_reviews.title: once you manage to get GalliumOS (fairly easy to install) you have a laptop that makes mac ...
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is very reliable, once you manage to get GalliumOS (fairly easy to install) you have a laptop that makes mac users cry and feel they got robbed. I'm a teacher, my mac using students say that the Pixel feels and looks better than their mac...
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Crouton!
customer_reviews.text: The hardware is solid on this device. ChromeOS is also very well-built, stable and touch-friendly, although it's yet to realize its full potential at this time. But install Crouton (the Ubuntu chroot), and all the usability gaps are instantly filled in! This device can now do everything I need for my day-to-day (including gaming), and I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best chromebook I have worked on
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best chromebook I have worked on. The touchscreen is by far its best feature. I am going to buy another before they are gone
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Gilmartin

customer_reviews.title: Great chromebook at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great chromebook at a good price. It does not have access to the play store but for me that is a non issue. I recommend this for anybody who wants a premium chromebook. The only downside is the battery only lasts about 4-5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sorry but it does not vork, a the sound disapeare. It does not turn on. And I would like to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i like it very much only battery dont last long about 2 hours
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: SLOOOOW
customer_reviews.text: SLOOOOW. Gets bogged down on anything other than email. Returning it
customer_reviews.author: rachel reshef

customer_reviews.title: New. Just getting used to it. I'm looking ...
customer_reviews.text: New. Just getting used to it. I'm looking forward to seeing how it improves my productivity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the later pixels are great. and this one is good but not worth ...
customer_reviews.text: the later pixels are great. and this one is good but not worth the price as even though they are calling it "new", it is actually the original gen 1 CB001 chromebook, which came out many years ago (but comes in a new box). it is not the latest chromebook by any stretch
customer_reviews.author: AtlJTH

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I love my chromebook!! It is a perfect size. It is everything I need! And it is nice and light!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia DEXTER

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  (But 100MB has been cancelled)
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop. I'm replacing a apple pro (retina) with it and like it much better. Nicer keyboard. Nicer interface (or at least for those of us who love linux). I have a ubuntu running using the change root method so you can switch from on to the other nicely. But, the 100MB/month verizon deal was cancelled as of Jan 1st 2014. So only get the LTE if you want to pay for data.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

product_meta.title: Super Google Chromebook Pixel 2013 (4G LTE) Touch Screen 12.85" 2560x1700 3:2 LCD i5-3427U 4GB DDR3 64GB SSD 3.4lbs Ultraportable
product_meta.description: Google Chromebook LTE 64GB in very good condition. Verizon LTE unactivated, the 1 Terrabyte storage space redemption is used. Comes with box power adapter and of course the chromebook itself.
feature_bullets: Bluetooth 3.0 , Webcam, and Dual Band WiFi Built in. Connect your Chromebook (if it have HDMI port) to a TV via HDMI and double check sound works there. Then make sure that speakers output is Chromebook
Weighs only 3.4 lbs. and measures just 0.6" thin.Check if there is a weird Chrome extension installed and perform a test by using Guest mode and see if it works or do a Chrome Browser Reset
Built In Verizon 4G LTE with 100mb included each month.If you suspect that there is a hardware issue do a EC Reset (Hard Reset)

Dual Core 1.8Ghz Intel i5 Processor and 4GB DDR3 RAM.Maybe there is an issue on the user profile, that can be fixed with a Powerwash Reset (Before you reset, make sure to back up your files on Google Drive or an external hard drive. The factory reset won't delete any of your files on Google Drive or external hard drive.)
3:2 Photographic Format Display Designed for Web and Multitouch Capabilities
